opendial.domains.rules.distribs

Class AnchoredRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.domains.rules.distribs.AnchoredRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProbDistribution, UtilityFunction

    public final class AnchoredRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProbDistribution, UtilityFunction
    Representation of a probabilistic rule anchored in a particular dialogue state.
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      AnchoredRule(Rule rule, DialogueState state)
      Anchors the rule in the dialogue state.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnchoredRule

        public AnchoredRule(Rule rule,
                    DialogueState state)
        Anchors the rule in the dialogue state. The construction process leads to the determination of:
        • the relevance of the rule in the given dialogue state
        • the range of possible values for the input nodes
        • the set of parameters associated with the rule
        • the set of possible effects generated by the rule
        • the set of possible values for the output nodes
        Parameters:
        rule - the probabilistic rule
        state - the dialogue state

      • isRelevant

        public boolean isRelevant()
        Returns true if the anchored rule is relevant (that is, it at least one matching rule case is non-empty), and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if rule is relevant, and false otherwise.
